name: Citrus-Herbed Baked Salmon
author: cktb2793
summary: This is one of the most flavorful and moist salmon recipes I have ever tasted.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Put two large squares of aluminum foil onto a large, flat work surface
Make a bed of lemon slices in the center of each foil square; top with red onion
Lay a salmon fillet atop each pile of lemon slices and onion; season with basil, dill, and sea salt
Fold edges of the aluminum foil over the salmon and seal completely
Bake in the preheated oven until the fish flakes easily with a fork, about 25 minutes
Remove salmon from foil pouch, place on plate, and drizzle juices from foil pouch over the fish
